name: Google Pale-Blue Background - Improved
description:
Google Search page with Pale-Blue background and Mediumblue links & black text. 

Also more than other 10 small color tweaks for some specific Google applications/services.

See also my "Google Search Results - Large Fonts" style - 
https://userstyles.org/styles/72130/google-search-results-large-fonts

See also my style 13382

user.name: LL25255252
user.about: I sometimes forget to check my userstyles RSS so if you want to report a problem send me a private message instead of starting a new discussion/review/question.

discussions.name: This Google search page script really does work brilliantly
I added all the other google search sites & translate.
